New Records: Paul van Meekeren took 4 wickets for 23 runs, a career-best performance for Netherlands in the match
Key Match Events: Taskin Ahmed was dismissed by Paul van Meekeren to secure Netherlands' victory
Mustafizur Rahman was also dismissed by Ackermann, contributing to Netherlands' win
Netherlands' disciplined bowling and aggressive batting led to a 87-run victory
Pre-Game Insights: Netherlands captain Scott Edwards aimed for a score around 220-230 and relied on bowlers for success
Bangladesh captain Shakib Al Hasan criticized the team's batting performance and fielding errors
Post-Match Reflections: Scott Edwards highlighted Netherlands' improved systems and teamwork
Shakib Al Hasan expressed frustration with the team's poor performance and fielding
Miscellaneous Highlights: Netherlands secured their first win at Eden Gardens in the World Cup
Mustafizur Rahman's highest score in the match was noted as a stat alert
